Hi

I am not sure where you can get it , but the proceedings of
http://eswsa.cs.uiuc.edu/index.html might be useful. (Although I
haven't seen them myself)

Cheers
Devdatta

2009/1/14 Ian Dickinson <i.j.dickinson@...>:
> We're discussing architecture choices in our team at the moment, and
> while I'm quite strongly in favour of a RESTful approach, there's some
> (not unexpected) concerns about efficiency etc. Does anyone have any
> references to (ideally empirical) studies or comparisons of deployed
> RESTful systems vs. other approaches?
>
> Thanks,
> Ian
>
>
